full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA'I BRTAN BZHUGS YONGS NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES PA 'DI NI DZA SAG THU HAN AAS MAG RGYAL KHANG RTZE'I DGON PO RAB BRTAN PHUN TSOGS GLING GI MCHOG SPRUL AE RTE NI PAndI TA HO THOG THU RTA MGRIN BADZRA GYI ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, AER TE NI PHYAG MDZAD PA NO YON HANG AA K'A LA'I CHE K'A LA KANG NI T'A WANG 'OD ZER BADZRA RGYAL KHANG RTZE HO THOG THU'I PHYAG MDZAD PA GRAGS PA RDO RJE GSOL DPON DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, WANG 'GING KHAMS MTSAN GYI BLA MA, DGE BSGOS DANG DGE 'PHEL, THU SA LA HO THU KE MEL @013A *, ,SNA TSOGS RTEN 'BREL, MI'I RING RDZANG GI THU ZA THAS SOGS SER SKYE THUN MONGS NAS MAndAL SKU GSUNG THUGS DANG RTEN BCAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA'I DOR KHU RAL MKHAN PO NO MON HANG SHING THUNG, ,)
